description: Amazon is one of the largest online retailers globally, offering a wide range of products, including electronics, clothing, books, groceries, and more. Founded in 1994 by Jeff Bezos, Amazon has transformed from a simple online bookstore to a vast e-commerce platform that operates across multiple industries. It provides services such as cloud computing (Amazon Web Services), streaming (Amazon Prime Video), and artificial intelligence. Amazon's prime feature is its quick and reliable delivery service, often offering same-day or next-day shipping options. With millions of products and a reputation for excellent customer service, Amazon has become a global shopping destination.

coupons.description: 25% off on selected items OR Free shipping on orders above $75.

description: Daraz is one of the largest online shopping platforms in South Asia, offering millions of products from local and international brands. With a focus on customer satisfaction, Daraz provides various payment methods such as cash on delivery, credit/debit card payments, and digital wallets. The platform regularly hosts sales and discounts, making it an attractive option for online shoppers in the region. Daraz also offers a range of services such as fast delivery, product returns, and customer support.

coupons.description: Free shipping on orders above $30 during sale.

description: Foodpanda is a popular online food delivery service that connects users with a wide range of restaurants, providing an easy way to order food and have it delivered to their doorstep. It operates in multiple countries across Asia, the Middle East, and parts of Europe. Foodpanda offers a variety of cuisines and food choices, from fast food to local delicacies, and also provides features like discounts, promo codes, and real-time tracking of orders.

coupons.condition: 50% off on orders over $50 OR 10% off site-wide.

description: Walmart is one of the largest retail corporations in the world, known for offering a wide variety of products at affordable prices. Walmart operates in multiple countries and provides everything from groceries and electronics to clothing and household goods. It offers both in-store and online shopping options, with services like home delivery, pickup, and even grocery delivery in certain regions. Walmart also features regular discounts and promotions, making it a go-to option for consumers looking for value and convenience.

coupons.description: 15% off on grocery orders OR 10% off on clothing.
coupons.condition: 15% off groceries OR 10% off clothing items.

coupons.description: Free shipping on grocery orders over $50 OR 5% off your total grocery order.
coupons.condition: Free shipping on groceries above $50 OR 5% off on grocery orders.

coupons.description: Save $50 on orders above $200 OR Free shipping on orders above $100.
coupons.condition: Save $50 on $200+ orders OR free shipping on $100+.

description: AliExpress is a global online retail service based in China that allows consumers to buy a wide variety of products at competitive prices. It connects buyers with manufacturers and suppliers, mostly from China, offering everything from electronics, clothing, toys, and home goods to beauty products and gadgets. AliExpress is known for its affordable prices, direct-to-consumer model, and the availability of a broad range of goods, often including unique or hard-to-find items.

Shein is a popular online fashion retailer that offers a wide range of trendy clothing, accessories, and footwear for women, men, and children. Known for its affordable pricing, Shein has gained massive popularity worldwide, particularly among younger shoppers. The platform frequently updates its collections, ensuring a constant flow of new styles to meet fashion trends. Shein also offers a variety of options in different categories such as beauty, home goods, and more.

Zalando is a leading European online fashion and lifestyle retailer, offering a wide range of clothing, shoes, accessories, and beauty products for men, women, and children. With a focus on customer satisfaction and convenience, Zalando provides a variety of international and local brands, offering both premium and budget-friendly options. Zalando is known for its excellent customer service, free delivery, and easy return policy, making it a popular destination for online shopping across Europe.

Flipkart is one of India's largest e-commerce platforms, offering a wide range of products across categories such as electronics, fashion, home appliances, groceries, books, and more. Flipkart is known for its competitive prices, frequent discounts, and wide-reaching sales events like the Big Billion Days, where users can access exclusive deals and offers. With a robust supply chain and customer service, Flipkart has become a go-to platform for online shopping in India.

Shopify is a leading e-commerce platform that enables businesses and entrepreneurs to create their own online stores to sell products. It provides a wide range of customizable features and tools that help businesses of all sizes build and manage their stores, process payments, and market their products. Shopify is popular among small and medium-sized businesses but is also used by large enterprises due to its scalability, flexibility, and user-friendly interface.

coupons.description: Get one month free with annual plan.
25% off on the second year subscription.

description: Uber Eats is an online food delivery platform that connects customers with their favorite restaurants through a user-friendly mobile app or website. Operating in cities across the globe, Uber Eats offers a wide range of food options, from fast food to gourmet meals. Customers can browse menus, place orders, and track deliveries in real-time. Uber Eats also offers features like scheduled orders, special promotions, and contactless delivery. The service allows restaurants to reach a broader audience, while customers can enjoy a convenient and hassle-free way to enjoy meals delivered to their doorsteps.

coupons.description: Free delivery on your first order.

description: BestBuy is one of the largest and most trusted retailers of consumer electronics, offering a vast selection of tech products, appliances, and accessories. BestBuy offers competitive pricing, frequent discounts, and promotional sales events. Customers can shop online or visit physical stores for an in-person experience, with expert advice and assistance. BestBuy also provides valuable services like product installation, tech support (Geek Squad), extended warranties, and financing options. Whether you're looking for a new smartphone, laptop, home theater system, or kitchen appliance, BestBuy is a go-to destination for all your tech needs.

coupons.description: Buy one, get one 50% off on select gadgets.

description: Target is a leading American retail chain known for offering a wide range of products including apparel, electronics, groceries, household goods, and beauty items. The company has built a reputation for offering high-quality products at affordable prices, often with trendy designs and exclusive brands. Target provides a convenient shopping experience both in-store and online, with the option for home delivery and in-store pickup. The companyâ€™s commitment to customer satisfaction, combined with a strong focus on inclusively, sustainability, and community engagement, has made it a beloved retailer across the U.S.

Lazada is a leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia, offering a wide variety of products, including electronics, clothing, home appliances, toys, and beauty products. It caters to customers in countries like Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, and Vietnam. Lazada provides a user-friendly online shopping experience, secure payment methods, and multiple delivery options. Through its partnerships with sellers, Lazada ensures a wide selection of products, from both global brands and local vendors. The platform also runs frequent promotions, flash sales, and discounts, making it a go-to destination for online shoppers in the region.
